function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to contagious diseases in a crowded room with 35 people","Impact":"Spread of disease, potential illness, and increased transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, improving ventilation, and enforcing hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, and UV disinfection devices","People":"Audience, event organizers, and room occupants","Owner":"Event organizers, building management, and health authorities"}]}
